snippet.title: Animus Toil | Re-Transmission Trailer (Game Boy, Analogue Pocket, PC, Web)
snippet.description:
MORE WAYS TO EXPERIENCE.

#AnimusToil, the debut experimental puzzle-adventure game from Mindset Makers, is available NOW on Game Boy, Analogue Pocket, PC, and any web browser of your choice!

Do you have what it takes to uncover the mystery that lies within the illusive Temple of the Herring? And what exactly is the evil wizard Somnus trying to hide?
Please proceed with curiosity.

https://mindsetmakers.itch.io/animus-toil

#gameboy #analoguepocket #indie #indiegame
